What should you do if you approached or prosecuted by police?

3 Dos
1. Ask the police to show his warrant card
2. Show your passport
3. Contact a lawyer

3 Don’t
1. Unlock your phone
2. Sign any protocols
3. Say anything

3. Umbrella
